attributes.action: Tax-Payers should not have to contribute to Thatcher's Full Ceremonial Funeral
attributes.additional_details:
I believe given the implimentation of the benefit cuts this week it's inappropiate that Tax-Payers are contributing towards the cost of Lady Thatchers 'Full Ceremonial Funeral'.

I wish the Government to address this and request that the cost of her funeral is met by donation, Friends and family.
